data.title: velbin: radial velocity corrected for binary orbital motions
data.name: velbin
data.description: No relation to the Russian village

evidence: README mentions binaries/installers: "This code convolves the radial velocity offsets due to binary orbital motions with a Gaussian to model an observed velocity distribution. This can be used to measure the mean velocity and velocity dis"

"This code convolves the radial velocity offsets due to binary orbital motions with a Gaussian to model an observed velocity distribution. This can be used to measure the mean velocity and velocity dispersion from an observed radial velocity distribution, corrected for binary orbital motions."
"This will copy velbin to the python library, making it available for importing in python"
